channel.title: Black Mesa Footage Archive
channel.description:
[i]If you have any experience using source recorder, or just capturing footage within Source, then your help is needed! [/i]
[b]The plan[/b] All of you, the community, submit as much video footage from Black Mesa as possible, and everyone can use the footage to make some kickass trailers.
[b]What we need[/b] We need flyover videos of the main set-pieces (dam, blast pit, lambda core, ect) and gameplay from all different chapters (combat mainly). For all gameplay please use "cl_drawhud 0" and try to record everything as high def as possible. All footage should be from within the mod itself.
[b][i]Good luck, and get cracking![/i][/b]
